title: How many vaccines will your child get? - Handout
cleaned_text: | | Give your patients information they are not getting anywhere else. Children today receive more vaccines than ever before yet childhood illnesses and chronic diseases are climbing higher and higher. Most parents have no idea how many vaccines their children receive and may not know of the documented risks. This handout, giving "just the facts," is perfect for initiating conversation and is an excellent patient education resource. 8 1/2" x 11" - 50 |1+ ||$18.49 ||each | | |
